title: Kraken gets $1 billion boost to take flight
description: Kraken has recently announced an approximately £750 million ($1 billion) funding round, paving the way for its demerger from Octopus Energy Group.
content: Kraken has recently announced an approximately £750 million ($1 billion) funding round, paving the way for its demerger from Octopus Energy Group.
